title: Software Engineer II
summary: Maintained WinForms and web apps for insurance products while standing up .NET Core services with Hangfire/EF over PostgreSQL and SQL Server to support auto-protect features.
description: Developed and maintained .Net WinForms and web applications supporting insurance and tenant operations.
Built .NET Core services with Hangfire and Entity Framework over PostgreSQL and SQL Server to drive insurance auto-protect workflows.
Added background jobs and APIs to keep coverage, eligibility, and billing data in sync across desktop and web products.
Clarified service boundaries and domain concepts, feeding the teamâ€™s early domain-driven design adoption.
Established unit-testing patterns for WinForms and service code and paired with engineers to spread the practice.
Collaborated with product and support to triage production issues in legacy code and refactor risky areas for stability.
Documented patterns and deployment steps so newer engineers could safely contribute to the legacy-heavy stack.
